name: SOCOM 3 U.S. Navy SEALs
summary: SOCOM 3 U.S. Navy SEALs is a third person tactical shooter video game for PlayStation 2 and the sequel to SOCOM II: U.S. Navy SEALs. The game was developed by Zipper Interactive in collaboration with the Naval Special Warfare Command and published by Sony Computer Entertainment. SOCOM 3 U.S. Navy SEALs was released on October 11, 2005, and was added to the list of Sony Greatest Hits games on August 4, 2006.
info:
• 中文名: 海豹突击队3
  • 发行: Sony Interactive Entertainment
  • 平台: PS2
  • 游戏类型: TPS / Tactical shooter
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2005年10月11日
